title: Nano-catalytic behavior of CeO<sub>2</sub> nanoparticles in dye adsorption: Synthesis through bio-combustion and assessment of UV-light-driven photo-adsorption of indigo carmine dye
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Sanjay S. Majani, Manoj, M. Lavanya, B. Swathi, N. Anuvarna, Muzaffar Iqbal, Shiva Prasad Kollur
